/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is filled with cars and motorcycles, indicating a busy time of day. Trees and bushes line the sides of the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the energy and color of the city.
